item.title: Harvest Sarasota invites community to paint rainbow crosswalk
item.description: On Sunday, September 14th, the Harvest is inviting community members to help paint a Pride crosswalk on The Harvest Sarasota/Harvest House campus, located at 3650 17th Street in Sarasota.

item.title: As Turning Point founder, Charlie Kirk was vital in building support for Republicans among young people
item.description: Charlie Kirk was a prominent conservative activist who embodied the pugnacious and populist approach to politics under Donald Trump’s Republican party.

item.title: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk dead after being shot at university event; initial persons of interest released
item.description: Charlie Kirk, a well-known conservative political activist, died after he was shot in the neck at an event at Utah Valley University on Wednesday.

item.title: SWAT team finds Bradenton suspect dead in home after he shot at deputies
item.description: After a three-hour standoff, the suspect was found dead inside the home.
